Package integration.project

Class Main

java.lang.Object
integration.project.Main
public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
Main class where program methods are stored. Allows for RPG game to be played.
Author:
Michael D'Agostino

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initializes the player character and 2 pal objects, then starts a loop where the program can be used indefinitely until exit. Loop is terminated on user exit or on player death.
      Parameters:
      args - needed to make main run

    • printMainMenu

      public static void printMainMenu()
      Prints main menu options to cmd line. Just a string.

    • promptCharCreation

      public static void promptCharCreation()
      Prints character creation prompt to cmd line.

    • getBattleOrder

      public static java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> getBattleOrder​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> myList)
      Takes given ArrayList of character objects, and sorts the lists based on the object's agility stat. The resulting sort will group together objects of similar types. Only supports an ArrayList with size 4.
      Parameters:
      myList - given ArrayList of Character objects
      Returns:
      sorted ArrayList

    • generateBattleArray

      public static java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> generateBattleArray​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> myList, byte loc)
      Adds a new Enemy object to the party's list of other Character Objects.
      Parameters:
      myList - ArrayList of Character Objects
      loc - byte that represents current location/player level interval
      Returns:
      ArrayList with Enemy Object added

    • battleLoop

      public static boolean battleLoop​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> battleList, int enemyPos, java.util.Scanner scan)
      Runs the battle loop until enemy health hits 0, or player character health hits 0. Creates a stat array that stores the stats of each entity in the battle. The battle loop then loops through each object in the order determined by getBattleOrder(), with each entity taking 1 action. Enemy and Pal objects are determined randomly, while the player can choose which action to take. When enemy or player health hits 0, loop ends. If enemy health hits 0, party gets exp and level up is checked. if player health hits 0, program ends.
      Parameters:
      battleList - sorted ArrayList containing Character Objects.
      enemyPos - given position of the enemy in the battle list
      scan - scanner object
      Returns:
      true if win, false if lose.

    • createBattleStatArray

      public static int[][] createBattleStatArray​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> myList)
      creates an array of Character's SPECIAL stats + health.
      Parameters:
      myList - ArrayList of Characters
      Returns:
      4x8 byte array of stats

    • loadQuest

      public static boolean loadQuest​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> myList, java.util.Scanner scan)
      Grabs location byte and battle list from player Character object and objects made in Main, then passes them to the battle loop. When battleLoop() is finished, party success is returned as boolean to determine results of battle.
      Parameters:
      myList - list of party Character objects
      scan - scanner object
      Returns:
      if party won or lost

    • getLocationName

      public static java.lang.String getLocationName​(byte location)
      Genertes location name depending on given byte.
      Parameters:
      location - given byte of player level
      Returns:
      string name

      public static void printBattleArray​(java.util.ArrayList<integration.project.Character> myList)
      Prints SPECIAL stats + money + level for each object.
      Parameters:
      myList - ArrayList of Chars

      Parameters:

      Returns:
